txt.en: You are inspired by your pet companion, and take on a few of its fighting characteristics.

Gain a unique buff based on which pet you have summoned.

Bears:
  +10% Max Morale
Birds:
  -15% Inductions
  Induction Setback Immunity
Felines:
  +5% Critical Chance
  +10% Melee Damage
Bog-guardians:
 +5m Damaging Skill Range
  +2.5% Tactical Critical Chance
